name: PiPiper Infrastructure
overview:
PiPiper Infrastructure is a Tier 1, carrier neutral communications service provider focused on domestic and international telecommunications carriers, mobile wireless companies, cable companies, content providers, enterprise businesses and government.

With Solutions tailored to the needs of our customers PiPiper Infrastructure can offer the right network, the right solutions and the attention to detail required to deliver the Largest Capacity Fibre Network and bespoke connectivity in Ireland.

PiPiper Infrastructure offers point to point 10 Gbit/s SDH and LAN PHY wavelengths between the major cities and carrier pops on the US Eastern seaboard and Western Europe, with a new direct transatlantic, dark-fibre cable system network to the Republic of Ireland and the United Kingdom. PiPiper Infrastructure will manage the terrestrial backhaul with a new 144 Pair, Tier 1, dark-fibre network across the Republic of Ireland.

milestones.description: Apollo Submarine Cable System Limited and PiPiper Infrastructure Ireland have announced that they are working together to land a direct transatlantic, dark-fibre cable system network to the Republic of Ireland
